markdown:
| icon              = poe2 morning_star_fine_icon.png
| description       = This morning star was the favored instrument of the pitiless ogre executioner of the Crookspur slaver port. The executioner reveled in his job and routinely tormented captives with threats of death and mock executions. Nothing thrilled him so much as the inevitable, periodic slave uprisings. After putting down such a revolt, the slavers turned to him to execute the ringleaders to discourage future resistance from the chattel. The executioner was not known for killing his victims quickly or cleanly, and preferred to break bones before administering the killing blow.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Weapon
| weapon_type       = Morning star

}}
